mxqsub -N PBMC_rep1_matrix --tmpdir 501G --stdout=./PBMC_rep1_matrix_out --stderr=./PBMC_rep1_matrix_err --threads=10 --memory=500G --runtime=6h bash /project/scATAC_analysis/scATAcat_review/preprocessing/Satpathy2019/PBMC_Rep1_scATAC/04_preprocessing_for_EpiAnno/get_Granja2019_PBMC_unified_peak_matrix/02b_create_Granja2019_PBMC_peaks_per_cell_matrix_job.sh
